org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.spark

Interface SparkPigSplit

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, Serializable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SparkPigSplit.FileSparkPigSplit, SparkPigSplit.GenericSparkPigSplit

    public interface SparkPigSplit
extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, Serializable
    Wrapper class for PigSplits in Spark mode Spark only counts HDFS bytes read if we provide a FileSplit, so we have to wrap PigSplits and have the wrapper class extend FileSplit
